main event: A report from Project Blue Book documents a sighting of a dirigible-like object in Mascoutah, Illinois, on 8th March 1953. The object was observed by civilian witnesses for about 30-35 seconds as it moved at a high rate of speed before disappearing towards the northeast.
interesting points: The object was described as dirigible-like in appearance and was observed for about 30-35 seconds.
No physical evidence or interception/identification action was taken regarding the sighting.
The report indicates the object appeared to move across the road before growing larger and disappearing at immense speed.
The witnesses were a civilian watch repairer and his wife, adding credibility to the sighting.
The document was downgraded at 3-year intervals and declassified after 12 years, indicating a standard protocol for handling such reports.
witnesses: civilian watch repairer and his wife
